Decklist.DesignGoal: Keep opponent low on land so that most of their spells become useless. Need to deal with Aether Vial and Goblin Lackey. Elves replaced Wild Growths to give more resistance to the Goblin Lackey

Card.Name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Yavimaya Elder
Card.RulesText: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

Card.Name: Argothian Wurm
Card.RulesText: Trample When Argothian Wurm enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice a land. If a player does, put Argothian Wurm on top of its owner's library.

Card.Name: Blastoderm
Card.RulesText: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Card.Name: Acidic Slime
Card.RulesText: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

Card.Name: Avenger Of Zendikar
Card.RulesText: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

Card.Name: Pelakka Wurm
Card.RulesText: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

Card.Name: Cursed Scroll
Card.RulesText: {3}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal a card at random from your hand. If that card has the chosen name, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Nature's Lore
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Thermokarst
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.

Card.Name: Winter's Grasp
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land.

Card.Name: Fallow Earth
Card.RulesText: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Processor
Card.RulesText: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. {4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

Card.Name: Predator, Flagship
Card.RulesText: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.

Card.Name: Plow Under
Card.RulesText: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

Card.Name: Khalni Garden
Card.RulesText: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Rishadan Port
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

Card.Name: Mishra's Factory
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Desert
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

Card.Name: Maze of Ith
Card.RulesText: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
